title: [Vacuum review. No. 2]
brief_description: Promotional documentary from around 1939 sponsored by the Vacuum Oil Company showing how Vacuum Oil lubricants are used in machinery including agricultural machinery, machinery used in the gold mining industry, a car body building plant machinery, earth moving equipment, cars and motorcycles. Title missing and no credits available.
